name: Dirty Dan
description:
Enjoy this mobile and PC friendly game made in one day. I was so happy when I finished this game and I hope it works well. 

"Avoid the saws and collect forest money. In the night play the Night Mode and on the day there is the Day Mode. Be the real Dirty Dan!"

|

Share your highscore in comments or on my Discord server!

Link to discord server is here : https://discord.com/invite/Fper8sa.

>- If you want to ask me why I don't publish this game on Play Store I will answer you with one word - fee. I don't wanna pay for it. If you want to give me some money I will add donations. You will guess - I want you to pay my fee. ( evil greedy noises )-<

If you love this game look up my other games on itch.io.

Comment your experience and feel free to contact me via email ( dennisbydengames@gmail.com)!

Follow my work and see you in my next projects and games!!!
